"Just the Two of Us" is a 1981 R&B single written by Bill Withers, William Salter and Ralph MacDonald,
which was recorded by Grover Washington Jr. and Bill Withers. The song appeared on Washington's album
Wine light. It reached number two on the Billboard Hot 100, and stayed there for 3 weeks. The song won
a Grammy Award for Best R&B Song.
